name: Special Shadow Edition Fightin
description:
Special Shadow Edition Fighting has to beat all the monsters that are constantly attacking him. Get ready for crazy fun and amusement in this martial shadow ultimate fight simulation and crush your enemies like kung fu expert
Go on in epic death fight: shadow battle and find out different ways to win the shadow street combat adventure with kicks, karate, jump and punches. Your motive is to strike with shrill characters and make yourself shadow strange fighter hero.
Game features:
- HD shadow world screen
- Impressive graphics and sounds
- Visual experience
- Thrilling sound effects and multiple camera views
- A game of stimulation and adventure
